mapper.select: SELECT `SLAVE`.RULE_ID AS SLAVE_RULE_ID, `SLAVE`.RULE_VER AS SLAVE_RULE_VER, `SLAVE`.RULE_NM AS SLAVE_RULE_NM, `MASTER`.RULE_ID AS MASTER_RULE_ID, `MASTER`.RULE_VER AS MASTER_RULE_VER, `MASTER`.RULE_NM AS MASTER_RULE_NM, CASE WHEN `MASTER`.VER_STATUS = 'R' THEN `MASTER`.RULE_ID ELSE (SELECT RULE_VER FROM targetai.RULE WHERE RULE_ID = `MASTER`.RULE_ID AND VER_STATUS = 'R') END AS MASTER_RULE_REAL_VER, DATE_FORMAT(`SLAVE`.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS IH_REG_DT, M.MEMBER_NAME AS IH_USER FROM targetai.RULE `SLAVE` LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE `MASTER` ON (`SLAVE`.REF_RULE_ID = `MASTER`.RULE_ID AND `SLAVE`.REF_RULE_VER = `MASTER`.RULE_VER) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (`SLAVE`.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE `SLAVE`.REF_RULE_ID IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE `SLAVE` LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE `MASTER` ON (`SLAVE`.REF_RULE_ID = `MASTER`.RULE_ID AND `SLAVE`.REF_RULE_VER = `MASTER`.RULE_VER) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (`SLAVE`.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) WHERE `SLAVE`.REF_RULE_ID IS NOT NULL
